title: Black Rose Beekeeper

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.

desc:
Post 3112
*Hidden in the bzzzz.*
- Use 1 bee to choose two players and learn exactly how long there was between the times their roles were posted in the thread.
- Use 2 bees to swap two players' attributes.
- Use 3 bees to brainwash a player. They will be forced to use the ability and targets that would most benefit the Unseen every phase for the rest of the game.
